hibernate-mapping.query: select new omis.presentenceinvestigation.report.PresentenceInvestigationRequestSummary( psir.id, offender.id, docket.value, psir.requestDate, personName.firstName, personName.lastName, userAccount.username, psir.expectedCompletionDate, psir.completionDate, offenderName.firstName, offenderName.lastName, offenderName.middleName, offender.offenderNumber, psir.sentenceDate, category.name, (select count(*) from omis.presentenceinvestigation.domain.PresentenceInvestigationTaskAssociation pita2 inner join pita2.task task where pita2.presentenceInvestigationRequest = psir and task.completionDate is not null ), (select count(*) from omis.presentenceinvestigation.domain.PresentenceInvestigationTaskGroup pitg, omis.task.domain.TaskTemplate tt where pitg.presentenceInvestigationCategory = category and pitg.group = tt.group), psir.submissionDate) from omis.presentenceinvestigation.domain.PresentenceInvestigationRequest psir inner join psir.category category inner join psir.docket docket inner join psir.assignedUser userAccount inner join userAccount.user user left outer join user.name personName left outer join docket.person offender left outer join offender.name offenderName where userAccount = :assignedUser
